revised_title: Investigations on the Discharge between Concentric Cylinders in Gases at Low Pressures
tldr: The author investigates the discharge between concentric cylinders in gases at low pressures, focusing on the effects of electrode geometry and gas type. The study reveals that the length of the Crookes dark space and the relation between current and potential are influenced by the choice of cathode and anode materials, as well as the gas being used.
